name: Ext_R4B_ConceptMap_gr_el_ta_equivalence
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.ConceptMap.group.element.target.equivalence for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ConceptMap.group.element.target.equivalence from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ConceptMap|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: relatedto | equivalent | equal | wider | subsumes | narrower | specializes | inexact | unmatched | disjoint
element.definition: The equivalence between the source and target concepts (counting for the dependencies and products). The equivalence is read from target to source (e.g. the target is 'wider' than the source).
element.comment: `ConceptMap.group.element.target.equivalence` maps to R5 `ConceptMap.group.element.target.relationship`. The value set relationship of RelatedTo is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as RelatedTo.
element.isModifierReason: Some of the values mean that there is no mapping from the source to the target, particularly 'disjoint', and the mapping cannot be interpreted without knowing this value as it could mean the elements are equivalent, totally mismatched or anything in between

element.short: relatedto | equivalent | equal | wider | subsumes | narrower | specializes | inexact | unmatched | disjoint
element.definition: The equivalence between the source and target concepts (counting for the dependencies and products). The equivalence is read from target to source (e.g. the target is 'wider' than the source).
element.comment: `ConceptMap.group.element.target.equivalence` maps to R5 `ConceptMap.group.element.target.relationship`. The value set relationship of RelatedTo is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as RelatedTo.

binding.description: The degree of equivalence between concepts.
